ir:
For the payable constructor function.
- the state variable owner will be updated to caller.

For the payable fallback function.
- When the indexofhodler of caller is not 0:
  - the balance of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the balance of caller).
  - When the lockeduntil of caller is smaller than (0x1e13380+current time), and the balance of caller is not greater than 0:
    - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to (0x1e13380+current time).
    - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0x1e13380.
- When the indexofhodler of caller is 0:
  - the balance of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the balance of caller).
  - the value caller will be put to the element in the hodlers.
  - the indexofhodler of caller will be updated to the element in the hodlers.
  - When the lockeduntil of caller is smaller than (0x1e13380+current time), and the balance of caller is not greater than 0:
    - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to (0x1e13380+current time).
    - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0x1e13380.

For the reclaimToken function, it has one argument and its type is address.
- For owner:
  - it calls an external function balanceOf of the first argument with the address of this contract as the argument, and gets the returned value as v0.
  - When the call or transfer succeeds:
    - it calls an external function transfer of the first argument with the following argument list: owner, and v0.

For the partyTo function, it has one argument and its type is address.
- When the balance of the first argument is greater than 0:
  - it transfers ether valued the balance of the first argument to the first argument. Afterthat, 
    - the balance of the first argument will be updated to 0.
  - When the indexofhodler of the first argument is greater than 0:
    - When the call or transfer fails:
      - the balance of the first argument will be updated to 0.
      - the lockeduntil of the first argument will be updated to 0.
      - the lockedfor of the first argument will be updated to 0.
      - the indexofhodler of the first argument will be updated to 0.
      - the value (the element in the hodlers+0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff) will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - When (the indexofhodler of the first argument+1) is smaller than the element in the hodlers:
        - the indexofhodler of the element in the hodlers with index (the indexofhodler of the first argument-1) will be updated to the indexofhodler of the first argument.
    - When the call or transfer fails, and the call or transfer fails, and for the first argument, and before the lockeduntil of the first argument:
      - the balance of the first argument will be updated to 0.
      - the lockeduntil of the first argument will be updated to 0.
      - the lockedfor of the first argument will be updated to 0.
      - the indexofhodler of the first argument will be updated to 0.
      - the value (the element in the hodlers+0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff) will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - When (the indexofhodler of the first argument+1) is smaller than the element in the hodlers:
        - the indexofhodler of the element in the hodlers with index (the indexofhodler of the first argument-1) will be updated to the indexofhodler of the first argument.
  - For the first argument, and before the lockeduntil of the first argument:
    - it transfers ether valued ((the balance of the first argument*10)/100) to owner.
    - When the call or transfer fails:
      - it transfers ether valued (the balance of the first argument-((the balance of the first argument*10)/100)) to the first argument.

For the payable hodlFor3y function.
- When the indexofhodler of caller is not 0:
  - the balance of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the balance of caller).
  - When the lockeduntil of caller is smaller than (0x5a39a80+current time):
    - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to (0x5a39a80+current time).
    - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0x5a39a80.
- When the indexofhodler of caller is 0:
  - the balance of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the balance of caller).
  - the value caller will be put to the element in the hodlers.
  - the indexofhodler of caller will be updated to the element in the hodlers.
  - When the lockeduntil of caller is smaller than (0x5a39a80+current time):
    - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to (0x5a39a80+current time).
    - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0x5a39a80.

For the payable hodlFor2y function.
- When the indexofhodler of caller is not 0:
  - the balance of caller will be updated to (the ether just received (i.e., msg.value)+the balance of caller).
  - When the lockeduntil of caller is smaller than (0x3c26700+current time):
    - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to (0x3c26700+current time).
    - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0x3c26700.
- When the indexofhodler of caller is 0:

  - the value caller will be put to the element in the hodlers.
  - the indexofhodler of caller will be updated to the element in the hodlers.
  - When the lockeduntil of caller is smaller than (0x3c26700+current time):

  - When the lockeduntil of caller is smaller than (0x1e13380+current time):
    - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to (0x1e13380+current time).
    - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0x1e13380.

For the party function.
- When the balance of caller is greater than 0:
  - it transfers ether valued the balance of caller to caller. Afterthat, 
    - the balance of caller will be updated to 0.
  - When the indexofhodler of caller is greater than 0:
    - When the call or transfer fails:
      - the balance of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the indexofhodler of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the value (the element in the hodlers+0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff) will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.

      - When (the indexofhodler of caller+1) is smaller than the element in the hodlers:
        - the indexofhodler of the element in the hodlers with index (the indexofhodler of caller-1) will be updated to the indexofhodler of caller.
    - When the call or transfer fails, and caller equals to caller, and the call or transfer fails, and before the lockeduntil of caller:
      - the balance of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the indexofhodler of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the value (the element in the hodlers+0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff) will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.

      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - When (the indexofhodler of caller+1) is smaller than the element in the hodlers:
        - the indexofhodler of the element in the hodlers with index (the indexofhodler of caller-1) will be updated to the indexofhodler of caller.
  - When caller equals to caller, and before the lockeduntil of caller:
    - it transfers ether valued ((the balance of caller*10)/100) to owner.
    - When the call or transfer fails:
      - it transfers ether valued (the balance of caller-((the balance of caller*10)/100)) to caller.

For the transferOwnership function, it has one argument and its type is address.
- When the first argument is not 0, and for owner:
  - the state variable owner will be updated to the first argument.

      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - When (the indexofhodler of caller+1) is smaller than the element in the hodlers:
        - the indexofhodler of the element in the hodlers with index (the indexofhodler of caller-1) will be updated to the indexofhodler of caller.
    - When the call or transfer fails, and caller equals to caller, and the call or transfer fails, and before the lockeduntil of caller:
      - the balance of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the lockeduntil of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the lockedfor of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the indexofhodler of caller will be updated to 0.
      - the value (the element in the hodlers+0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff) will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - the value 0 will be put to the element in the hodlers.
      - When (the indexofhodler of caller+1) is smaller than the element in the hodlers:
        - the indexofhodler of the element in the hodlers with index (the indexofhodler of caller-1) will be updated to the indexofhodler of caller.
  - When caller equals to caller, and before the lockeduntil of caller:
    - it transfers ether valued ((the balance of caller*10)/100) to owner.
    - When the call or transfer fails:
      - it transfers ether valued (the balance of caller-((the balance of caller*10)/100)) to caller.

For the transferOwnership function, it has one argument and its type is address.
- When the first argument is not 0, and for owner:
  - the state variable owner will be updated to the first argument.

.
 Here are some state variables with their corresponding types: public state variable `owner` is typed address,public state variable `hodlers` is typed array,public state variable `indexofhodler` is typed mapping,public state variable `balanceof` is typed mapping,public state variable `lockeduntil` is typed mapping,public state variable `lockedfor` is typed mapping.
